channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road falling apart, 14th March
item.description:
The road is in a really poor state here, so much so that cycling down it was painful and I nearly bounced into a car while trying to navigate it. Please can this be fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 127 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road falling apart, 14th March
item.description:
This road is in an awful state. Driving down it is bad enough - cycling is painful.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 45 Reddings Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes on both sides of road, 14th March
item.description:
4 or 5 deep potholes on both sides of road in the same spot, now impossible for motorists to miss right outside of entrance to primary school, drivers swerving at last minute to avoid them is dangerous to pedestrians and cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Church Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cleeve Common Road, 14th March
item.description:
A pothole has opened up across the road such that it cannot be avoided. The location is just past the turning to Drypool Farm. All along the road - potholes have opened up again and have gotten quite deep in places. Please can these be filled in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 'Split' in road where concrete plates meet, 14th March
item.description:
This damage to the road surface on Gilpin Rd (between Gatton Way & Duncroft Rd junctions) has worsened significantly during the winter months as water gathers in the split and then freezes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 98 Gilpin Avenue, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti in 3 places,in Manor Rd near Swindon Hall and by stile near village hall. Also on Road sign for Manor Court, 14th March
item.description:
These appeared several weeks ago, appear to have made with aerosol paint spray. You may recognize the graffiti "signature" from other locations ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 45 Church Road, Swindon Village

item.title: Wood on bridge rotten, 14th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Mill Close Mill Street, Prestbury

item.title: Van parked on Double Yellow Line, 14th March

item.title: Pothole on Pilley Lane, 14th March

item.title: Deep pothole again on church Road, 14th March
item.description:
Recently repaired pothole outside the village hall on Church Road has become a large pothole again. It looks like there was a poor repair that requires a lore robust repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Leckhampton Village Hall Church Road, Leckhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deteriorating road surface, 14th March
item.description:
Queens Road (GL50 2NE). Very degraded utility trench in Queens Road, adjacent to junction with Kensington Avenue. Multiple potholes - whole lot needs cutting out and resurfacing fully, not just individual buckets of tarmac in each pothole. ALSO multiple potholes / wearing course missing from Kensington Avenue junction onto old railway bridge. Again, needs cutting out and resurfacing properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 82 Queen's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
